meanings.definition: Plan or invent (a complex procedure, system, or mechanism) by careful thought.
meanings.sent1: She devised a new way to organize her toys by color.
meanings.sent2: The team devised a strategy to win the game.
meanings.sent3: He devised a plan to sneak cookies from the jar without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent4: The scientist devised a groundbreaking theory that changed the way we understand the universe.
meanings.sent5: The detective devised a clever trap to catch the thief red-handed.

meanings.definition: Formulate a method or plan for (a course of action).
meanings.sent1: The teacher devised a fun game to help students learn math.
meanings.sent2: They devised a schedule to ensure everyone had a chance to speak during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The chef devised a recipe for a cake made entirely of vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The artist devised a unique way to paint using only their fingers.
meanings.sent5: The engineer devised a plan to build a bridge that could withstand any storm.
